mapper.insert: insert into t_borrow_info (borrow_id, lend_time, give_back_time, reader_id, book_id, be_overdue, fine, be_overdue_day) values (#{borrowId},#{lendTime},#{giveBackTime}, #{readerId},#{beOverdue},#{bookId} #{fine},#{beOverdueDay});
mapper.update:
update t_borrow_info
borrow_id=#{borrowId},
lend_time=#{lendTime},
give_back_time=#{giveBackTime},
reader_id=#{readerId},
be_overdue=#{beOverdue},
book_id=#{bookId},
fine=#{fine},
be_overdue_day=#{beOverdueDay}
whether_lend=#{whetherLend}
where borrow_id=#{borrowId}
mapper.select: SELECT b_i.borrow_id, b_i.lend_time, b_i.give_back_time, b_i.reader_id, b_i.book_id, b_i.be_overdue, b_i.fine, b_i.be_overdue_day, b_i.whether_lend, b.`book_name`, r.`name` FROM t_borrow_info AS b_i LEFT JOIN t_book AS b ON b_i.`book_id`=b.`book_id` LEFT JOIN t_reader AS r ON b_i.`reader_id`=r.`reader_id` where borrow_id=#{borrowId}

SELECT count(b_i.borrow_id) FROM t_borrow_info AS b_i LEFT JOIN t_book AS b ON b_i.`book_id`=b.`book_id` LEFT JOIN t_reader AS r ON b_i.`reader_id`=r.`reader_id`
INSTR (b.book_name,#{keyword}) OR INSTR(r.name,#{keyword})
